poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Fit your face around This fist first and then We'll flirt with questions Later. Flicked The sonar switch: he's bats flit flit Dear doctor inappropriate Affect fixed again Like he did last summer He's flipped again Like he did last year O wo wo yea. Frisked him, fished out Something he'd filched or sumbdy What's that then? Search me.
